Candidate Name:	61327
PERSONAL DETAILS
Location: 		West Yorkshire
QUALIFICATIONS
HND Mechanical Engineering – University of Central Lancashire (UCLAN), 1989
Design & Development, Mechanics and Materials, Operations Management, Engineering Systems, Advanced Mechanics and Materials, Engineering Applications, Manufacturing Engineering.
CAREER SUMMARY
2018 to date: EPCI Engineering Limited – Ennery, France
EPCI Engineering is an engineering company involved in the field of technical fastening solutions. They work in close cooperation with their customers and assist with prototyping, concept, and production fastening solutions. Aeronautics & Space, Military & Defence, Railway, Transport, Industry and Petroleum Equipment sectors.
Turnover: €4M p/a (Aerospace / Defence UK & Europe) and $8M p/a (A Candidate Name:	61327
PERSONAL DETAILS
Location: 		West Yorkshire
QUALIFICATIONS
HND Mechanical Engineering – University of Central Lancashire (UCLAN), 1989
Design & Development, Mechanics and Materials, Operations Management, Engineering Systems, Advanced Mechanics and Materials, Engineering Applications, Manufacturing Engineering.
CAREER SUMMARY
2018 to date: EPCI Engineering Limited – Ennery, France
EPCI Engineering is an engineering company involved in the field of technical fastening solutions. They work in close cooperation with their customers and assist with prototyping, concept, and production fastening solutions. Aeronautics & Space, Military & Defence, Railway, Transport, Industry and Petroleum Equipment sectors.
Turnover: €4M p/a (Aerospace / Defence UK & Europe) and $8M p/a (Aerospace / Defence USA)
Clients: BAE Systems / Rolls-Royce / Airbus / Safran / Boeing / MBDA / AIM Altitude / Thompson Aero Seating / Thales / Raytheon.
Position: Sales Manager
Key Responsibilities:
UK Key Account Management and wider sales coverage across UK, Europe, and USA. Industry sectors (Aerospace / Defence). Blue chip customer base development (Rolls-Royce / BAE / Airbus / Safran / Boeing)
Manage internal / external European sales team (4 reports) and USA external sales (8 reports)
Project management of new / existing projects
Formulate and report KPIs for ASMs
Set pricing for product lines
Present proposals / offers to new / existing clients
Responsible for profit and loss (P&L) margins
Work with ASMs to generate new opportunities and with project management of new/existing projects
Worked directly with department’s clients and management to achieve results
Strengthened company’s business by leading implementation of projects
Develop new sales / marketing literature and compile new company presentation
Time management plan for ASMs to maximise area coverage
Develop a positive sales strategy, medium / long term
Look at sales areas and analyse breakdown into smaller areas for more effective coverage
Identify new business potential / added value opportunities
Working proactively with new / existing customers
Exhibit / promote / organise company’s services at relevant trade show/s
Key Achievements:
£150k p/a contract with Rolls Royce (3-year LTA) 	£100k p/a contract with Airbus (1 year rolling LTA)
£100k p/a contract with AIM Altitude (2-year LTA) 	£50k p/a contract with MBDA (1 year rolling LTA)
2017 – 2018 Perfect Bore Manufacturing Ltd – Andover, Hampshire
Sub-Contract Precision Machining.
Turnover: £4 – 6M p/a (Aerospace / Defence / Nuclear / Automotive)
Clients: BAE Systems / Rolls-Royce / Airbus / Meggit / UTC / MOOG / Meritor / Carlisle Brake / Babcock
Position: Business Development Director
Key Responsibilities:
Key Account Management in UK and Europe. Industry sectors (Aerospace / Defence / Automotive / Nuclear / Renewables). Blue chip customer base development (Rolls-Royce / BAE / Airbus / Moog / Meggitt / UTC).
Manage Internal Sales team (4 reports) and Manufacturing BU Managers (4 reports)
Responsible for profit and loss (P&L) margins
Project management of new / existing projects
Formulate and report KPI’s for BUMs
Examined / implemented change in manufacturing methodology to increase profitability
Set pricing for each machining area
Present proposals / machining offers to new / existing clients
Work with existing and generate new sub-contract machining opportunities
Develop new sales / marketing literature and company presentation (Sub-Contract Facilities)
Time management for effective area coverage
Identify new business potential / added value machining opportunities
Key Achievements:
£200k p/a contract with Rolls Royce (3-year LTA)
£250k p/a contract with William Cook Defence (2-year LTA)
2010 – 2016 Mollart Cox Engineering / Products Ltd – Chesterfield
Sub-Contract Precision Machining.
Turnover: £4 – 6M p/a (Oil & Gas / Mining / Nuclear / Aerospace)
Clients: Halliburton / GE / Baker Hughes / Joy Global / Babcock / BAE Systems / Rolls Royce
Position: Sales Director
Key Responsibilities:
Key Account Management – Area coverage UK & Europe. Industry sectors (Oil / Gas / Aerospace / Defence / Automotive / Nuclear / Mining

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
